level.heading: Waiver of overpayments.
level.text: The collection of an overpayment of not more than $25 may be waived for child development centers, child development homes, or in-home caregivers who are no longer providing day care services for the Department.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-16, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-401.
